name: Tough
description: Character is naturally tough and can withstand more damage. +10 to Vitality for calculating HP.

name: Quick Reflexes
description: Character has exceptionally fast reflexes. +5 to initiative and +5 to Dexterity for defense calculations.

name: Talented
description: Character has a natural talent for a specific skill, gaining +10 when using it.

name: Psionic Sensitivity
description: Character has heightened psionic potential. +15 to PSY attribute for power calculations.

name: Weapon Specialization
description: Character is highly trained with a specific weapon type, gaining +10 to hit and +5 to damage.

name: Sickly
description: Character is prone to illness and physical weakness. -10 to Vitality for HP calculations.

name: Slow
description: Character has below average reflexes. -5 to initiative and -5 to Dexterity for defense calculations.

name: Addiction
description: Character is addicted to a substance and suffers withdrawal if not regularly consumed.

mechanics.withdrawal_effects: -10 to all attributes when in withdrawal

name: Phobia
description: Character has an irrational fear that can be triggered during gameplay.

mechanics.fear_effect: Must make a PSY check or be unable to act for 1d4 rounds

name: Debt
description: Character owes money or favors to a powerful organization or individual.
